I would visit different eras to see how people lived and worked, such as ancient Egypt or medieval Europe.
I would go back in time to prevent historical events from happening, like the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand or the sinking of the Titanic.
I would travel to different parts of the world to explore new cultures and experiences, such as visiting the Great Wall of China or the pyramids of Egypt.
I would visit famous historical figures and observe their daily lives, such as meeting Leonardo da Vinci or attending a lecture by Albert Einstein.
I would travel to different timelines and alternate realities to see how different versions of history unfolded, and observe the consequences of different choices made by individuals and societies.
